column4: Name of the court which has delivered the current judgement if extracted from Preamble. Name of any court mentioned if extracted from judgment sentences.
Name of the petitioners / appellants /revisionist  from current case
Name of the respondents / defendents /opposition from current case
Name of the judges from current case  if extracted from preamble. Name of the judges of the current as well as previous cases if extracted from judgment sentences.

column3: Name of the lawyers from both the parties
Any date mentioned in the judgment
Name of organizations mentioned in text apart from court. E.g. Banks
Geopolitical locations which include names of countries
Name of the act or law mentioned in the judgement
All the past court cases referred in the judgement as precedent. Precedent consists of party names + citation(optional) or case number (optional)
All the other case numbers mentioned in the judgment (apart from precedent) where party names and citation is not provided
Name of witnesses in current judgment
Name of the all the person that are not included in petitioner
